content:
Who am I? I’m 25 years old and currently living in Auckland, New Zealand.
I love working on the front-end, but I’m a capable full stack developer.
I’m a hands-on engineer that loves a challenge, learning new skills and getting things done.
My Interests Snowboarding - Got into it whilst living in Christchurch
Music - Most sounds under the umbrella that is Electronic Dance Music, though DnB is closest to my ‚ù§Ô∏è
Gaming - Playing lots of Overwatch and Super Smash Bros Ultimate, with a few others in the mixÔ∏è
Game Dev - Very slowly doing a Udemy course on game development
Gym - üí™
Reading - Love to read, mostly sci-fi and fantasy. My favourite author is Brandon Sanderson
My Skills Software Engineering Full Stack Developer
Front-end, back-end and mobile development DevOps
CI/CD experience in various tools Cloud
Experience with Cloud platforms and designing solutions match Languages & Frameworks Front-end TypeScript Angular Vue.js React D3.js Node Jest Back-end C# C C++ Go Java Kotlin Python SQL .NET Infra & CI/CD Docker Helm Kubernetes Terraform Certifications Azure Developer Associate
Achieved¬†20¬†April¬†2022
